item.title: Using VMware.Sdk.Vcf.Ops: Commands for VCF Operations
item.description: VCF PowerCLI 9.0 now includes a module called VMware.Sdk.Vcf.Ops, this modules contains auto-generated cmdlets to support VCF Operations Public APIs. Use can use this post as a quick reference guide. Connecting to a VCF Operations Instance with Local Credentials Start a PowerShell session. Connect to a VCF Operations instance using local credentials by running the following command: 1Connect-VcfOpsServer -Server flt-ops01a.rainpole.io -User admin -Password VMw@re1!VMw@re1! Once connected the following information is stored in $defaultOpsConnections.
